inair.view

Class UIAbstractCollectionView

  • java.lang.Object
    • inair.data.DependencyObject
      • inair.data.IAElement
        • inair.input.IAInputElement
          • inair.view.UIView
            • inair.view.UIViewGroup
              • inair.view.UIAbstractCollectionView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    UIViewManager, UIViewParent
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    UILayeredNavigationView, UIListView, UIMenuView

    public abstract class UIAbstractCollectionView
extends UIViewGroup

    Represents a control that can be used to present a collection of items 

     Attribute for UIAbstractCollectionView can use in layout xml file

 attr name="itemsSource" format="string" getItemsSource()  setItemsSource(java.util.List)
 attr name="itemTemplate" format="string" getItemTemplate()  setItemTemplate(inair.data.DataTemplate)

 And all attribute can use with UIView

    Note this class is currently under early design and development. The API will likely change in later updates of the compatibility library, requiring changes to the source code of apps when they are compiled against the newer version.

    Copyright (c) 2014 SeeSpace.co. All rights reserved.

    • Method Detail

      • setItemsSource

        public void setItemsSource(java.util.List collection)
        Set items source for this collection view

        ItemsSource specifies a collection used to generate the content of this collection view. This provides a simple way to use exactly one collection as the source of content for this control.

        Parameters:
        collection - data source collection

      • getItemsSource

        public java.util.List getItemsSource()
        Get current items source
        Returns:
        data source list

      • setItemTemplate

        public void setItemTemplate(DataTemplate dataTemplate)
        Set ItemTemplate for this collection view

        ItemTemplate is the template used to display each item.

        Parameters:
        dataTemplate - template view will be set see DataTemplate

      • getItemTemplate

        public DataTemplate getItemTemplate()
        Get current ItemTemplate of this collection view
        Returns:
        current template see DataTemplate
